filmography.title: Jamaica Inn
filmography.role_description: An orphan who discovers her aunt and uncle run a gang of shipwreckers in Cornwall; her first major film role.
filmography.plot: A young woman discovers that her uncle heads a gang of ship-wreckers who lure ships to their doom on the Cornish coast.

filmography.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
filmography.role_description: A beautiful gypsy dancer who shows compassion to the deformed bell-ringer Quasimodo, sparking obsession in others.
filmography.plot: In 15th-century Paris, the hunchbacked bell-ringer of Notre Dame tries to save a beautiful gypsy dancer from a corrupt official.

filmography.title: Dance, Girl, Dance
filmography.role_description: An aspiring ballerina who struggles to maintain her artistic integrity while working in a burlesque troupe.
filmography.plot: Two dancers strive to preserve their own integrity while fighting for their place in the spotlight and for the affections of a wealthy suitor.

filmography.title: How Green Was My Valley
filmography.role_description: The beautiful daughter of a Welsh mining family who sacrifices her love for the local preacher to marry a wealthy mine owner's son.
filmography.plot: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans raise coal-mining sons and hope for a better future.

filmography.title: The Black Swan
filmography.role_description: A noblewoman who is kidnapped by a dashing pirate but eventually falls in love with him.
filmography.plot: A reformed pirate helps the governor of Jamaica rid the Caribbean of the buccaneers who refuse to give up their trade.

filmography.title: To the Shores of Tripoli
filmography.role_description: A stern but beautiful Navy nurse who becomes the romantic interest of a cocky Marine recruit.
filmography.plot: A smart-aleck playboy joins the Marines and tries to romance a nurse while clashing with his drill sergeant.

filmography.title: This Land Is Mine
filmography.role_description: A schoolteacher in a Nazi-occupied European town who aids the resistance and inspires her timid colleague.
filmography.plot: A timid schoolteacher in an occupied country is forced to take a stand against the Nazis and collaborators.

filmography.title: The Fallen Sparrow
filmography.role_description: A mysterious woman with a dark secret who becomes involved with a Spanish Civil War veteran hunting Nazi spies.
filmography.plot: A Spanish Civil War veteran returns to New York to find the man who murdered his friend and tortured him in captivity.

filmography.title: Buffalo Bill
filmography.role_description: The wife of the legendary frontiersman Buffalo Bill, who struggles with his fame and their changing life.
filmography.plot: The story of Buffalo Bill Cody, from his days as an Army scout to his success with his Wild West Show.

filmography.title: The Spanish Main
filmography.role_description: A Spanish noblewoman captured by a pirate captain, sparking a romance amidst high-seas adventure.
filmography.plot: A Dutch pirate captures a Spanish ship carrying the fiancée of the corrupt governor of Cartagena.

filmography.title: Sentimental Journey
filmography.role_description: A dying actress who adopts a young orphan girl to comfort her husband after she is gone.
filmography.plot: A famous actress with a heart condition adopts a young girl to give her husband a companion after her death.

filmography.title: Sinbad the Sailor
filmography.role_description: A beautiful and cunning woman who seeks the treasure of Alexander the Great, crossing paths with Sinbad.
filmography.plot: Sinbad embarks on his eighth voyage to find the lost treasure of Alexander the Great.

filmography.title: Miracle on 34th Street
filmography.role_description: A cynical Macy's executive who hires a man claiming to be Santa Claus, eventually learning to believe in magic.
filmography.plot: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

filmography.title: Sitting Pretty
filmography.role_description: A suburban mother who hires an eccentric, genius babysitter named Mr. Belvedere, leading to chaos and comedy.
filmography.plot: A couple hires a mysterious man to babysit their unruly children, only to find he is a genius writing a novel about their neighborhood.
filmography.awards: WGA Award: Win – Best Written American Comedy

filmography.title: A Woman's Secret
filmography.role_description: A former singer who confesses to shooting her protégée, though the truth is far more complicated.
filmography.plot: A singer is shot and her mentor confesses to the crime, but flashbacks reveal a complex relationship of jealousy and ambition.

filmography.title: Rio Grande
filmography.role_description: The estranged wife of a cavalry officer who arrives at his fort to reclaim their son, rekindling their romance.
filmography.plot: A cavalry officer posted on the Rio Grande is faced with murderous raiding Apaches, a son who's a risk-taking recruit, and his wife who wants to take their son home.

filmography.title: The Quiet Man
filmography.role_description: A fiery Irish spinster who marries a retired American boxer but refuses to consummate the marriage until he fights for her dowry.
filmography.plot: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother opposes their match.

filmography.title: Against All Flags
filmography.role_description: A pirate captain who falls for a British officer working undercover to dismantle the pirate stronghold.
filmography.plot: A British naval officer goes undercover to infiltrate a pirate base on Madagascar and falls for a female pirate captain.

filmography.title: The Long Gray Line
filmography.role_description: The devoted Irish wife of a West Point athletic trainer, supporting him through decades of service.
filmography.plot: The biography of Martin Maher, who came to West Point as a waiter and stayed for 50 years, becoming a beloved instructor.

filmography.title: The Wings of Eagles
filmography.role_description: The long-suffering wife of naval aviator Frank 'Spig' Wead, enduring his long absences and dedication to the service.
filmography.plot: The biography of Frank 'Spig' Wead, a naval aviator turned screenwriter who fought to promote naval air power.

filmography.title: Our Man in Havana
filmography.role_description: A British secret service secretary sent to Havana to assist a vacuum cleaner salesman turned spy.
filmography.plot: An expatriate Englishman living in Havana creates a ring of fictional spies to satisfy his British intelligence superiors.

filmography.title: The Parent Trap
filmography.role_description: The sophisticated mother of separated twins who is tricked into reuniting with her ex-husband.
filmography.plot: Teenage twin sisters swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.

filmography.title: The Deadly Companions
filmography.role_description: A grieving widow determined to bury her son in a dangerous town, escorted by an ex-Union soldier.
filmography.plot: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through Indian territory.

filmography.title: Mr. Hobbs Takes a Vacation
filmography.role_description: The patient wife who tries to keep the peace during a chaotic family vacation with her grumpy husband.
filmography.plot: A man tries to enjoy a peaceful seaside vacation with his family, but everything goes wrong.
filmography.awards: Berlin Int'l Film Festival: Win – Best Actor (James Stewart)

filmography.title: McLintock!
filmography.role_description: The estranged, headstrong wife of a cattle baron who returns to their ranch, sparking a comedic battle of the sexes.
filmography.plot: Wealthy rancher G.W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

filmography.title: The Rare Breed
filmography.role_description: A determined English widow who brings a Hereford bull to the American West to improve cattle stock.
filmography.plot: A woman and her daughter enlist a drifter to help them transport a prize bull to a breeder in Texas.

filmography.title: Big Jake
filmography.role_description: The matriarch of a ranching family who hires her estranged husband to rescue their kidnapped grandson.
filmography.plot: The McCandles ranch is overrun by a gang of cutthroats who kidnap Little Jake and demand a ransom, prompting Big Jake to take action.

filmography.title: Only the Lonely
filmography.role_description: The overbearing, bigoted Irish mother of a Chicago cop who tries to sabotage his romance; O'Hara's final film role.
filmography.plot: A Chicago cop must balance his new romance with his overbearing mother who doesn't want him to leave her.
